Kemendikbud Hadiahi SMPN 1 Sumber Cirebon Gawai Senilai Rp. 846 Juta
01 Nov 2019, 20:55 by Yulianti


Kemendikbud Hadiahi SMPN 1 Sumber Cirebon Gawai Senilai Rp. 846 Juta

KBRN Cirebon : Keberhasilan mempertahankan nilai ujian nasional tertinggi se Kabupaten Cpirebon selama tiga tahun, membuat SMP Negeri 1 Sumber mendapatkan apresiasi penghargaan dari Kementerian Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan Kemendikbud.Kepala SMP Negeri 1 Sumber, Herri Purnama kepada RRI menyebutkan prestasi tersebut adalah hasil kerja keras bersama antara siswa dan guru sehingga capaian yang membanggakan itu bisa diraih.Diakui penghargaan dari Kemendikbud diluar perkiraan sebelumnya yaitu sekolah akan mendapatkan gawai dengan total Rp.846 juta"Kementerian Pendidikan Nasional ini memberikan rewads kepada SMP N 1 Sumber itu berupa Tab. Nilainya fantastis kuranag lebih sekitar Rp.846 juta. Kalau kita hargakan misalnya gawai Rp 2 juta maka ini kurang lebih kita mendapatkan 400 gawai buat anak - anak kita" jelasnya.Ditambahkan Herri Purnama , pemberian penghargaan gawai dari Kemendikbud akan dilaksanakan pada triwulan terakhir melalui sistim lelang. Terlepas dari proses lelang apakah dari pihak Disdik Kabupaten Cirebon atau Kemendikbud pihaknya bersyukur karena sangat berguna bagi siswa dalam menghadapi era globalisasi industri 4.0."Siswa SMP Negeri 1 harus dipersiapkan dari sekarang supaya sudah mempunyai pengalaman dan semakin maju dalam IT" ujarnya.Terkait kesiapan menghadapi UN 2020, ,Herri menjelaskan tahun ini pihaknya telah merintis dengan membagi kelompok atas dan bawah dalam empat mata pelajaran yang di UN kan.Â Kelompok atas didorong supaya maksimal bisa mencapai nilai sempurna 100 sedangkan kelompok bawah diberi dorongan materi pembelajaran hingga masuk ke kelompok menengah karena ditargetkan tetap mempertahankan prestasi sehingga bisa bersaing dengan sekolah lain diluar Kabupaten Cirebon.Selain itu, reward dari Kemendikbud bisa menjadi referensi bagi Disdik Kabupaten Cirebon untuk mendukung tambahan peralatan tablet yang masih kurang secara jumlah." Alokasi gawai dari penghargaan Kemendikbud digunakan bagi siswa dari keluarga kurang mampu"pungkasnya.

Ministry of Education and Culture Reward SMPN 1 Sumber Cirebon Gawai Worth Rp. 846 Million
Nov 01 2019, 20:55 by Yulianti


Ministry of Education and Culture Reward SMPN 1 Sumber Cirebon Gawai Worth Rp. 846 Million

KBRN Cirebon: The success of maintaining the highest national exam scores in the Cpirebon Regency for three years, made SMP Negeri 1 Sumber get an appreciation award from the Ministry of Education and Culture of the Ministry of Education and Culture. Head of SMP Negeri 1 Sumber, Herri Purnama told RRI that the achievement was the result of hard work between students and teachers so that the proud achievements can be achieved. The award from the Ministry of Education and Culture is beyond previous estimates that the school will get a device with a total of Rp.846 million. "The Ministry of National Education gives rewads to SMP N 1. The source is in the form of Tab. "We are priced for example Rp. 2 million, then this is more or less we get 400 devices for our children," he explained. Added Herri Purnama, the awarding of devices from the Ministry of Education and Culture will be carried out in the last quarter through the auction system. Regardless of the auction process whether the Disdik Cirebon Regency or the Ministry of Education and Culture is grateful because it is very useful for students in facing the era of industrial globalization 4.0. "Students of SMP Negeri 1 must be prepared from now on so that they already have experience and are increasingly advanced in IT," he said. UN 2020, Herri explained that this year he had pioneered by dividing the upper and lower groups into four subjects at the UN. The upper group is encouraged so that the maximum can reach a perfect score of 100 while the lower group is given encouragement of learning material to enter the middle group because it is targeted to maintain achievements so that they can compete with other schools outside Cirebon Regency. In addition, the reward from the Ministry of Education and Culture can be a reference for Disdik Cirebon Regency to support additional tablet devices that are still lacking in number. "The allocation of devices from the Ministry of Education and Culture award is used for students from underprivileged families," he concluded.
